item.title: By: heather
item.dc:creator: heather
item.description: Ugh, I've been getting mail from the "peons" in my in-game mailbox nearly every day. Annoying. Only recently caught the channel spam, although I occasionally get whisper spam. Not like you can really report them either, because they typically delete the toon as soon as they use it.
item.content:encoded: Ugh, I’ve been getting mail from the “peons” in my in-game mailbox nearly every day. Annoying. Only recently caught the channel spam, although I occasionally get whisper spam. Not like you can really report them either, because they typically delete the toon as soon as they use it.

item.title: By: drypulse
item.dc:creator: drypulse
item.description: that peons guild has been spamming my server as well. i just wonder how they spam every /1 channel in the game while they're in teldrassil... you'd think blizz could fix that
item.content:encoded: that peons guild has been spamming my server as well. i just wonder how they spam every /1 channel in the game while they’re in teldrassil… you’d think blizz could fix that
